front.title: Relay Bag Search Control for the Federated Internet Registry Service

abstract.t: This document describes an LDAP search request and response controlto allow additional unspecified data to be returned with a referralto the client, which can submit these data to the referred to serverin support of the Federated Internet Registry Service (FIRS)described in [FIRS-ARCH] and [FIRS-CORE]. A flexible containercalled relay bag as required in [CRISP-REQ] is included into thisextension to the LDAP search operation.
